## createJsonBodySelector() function

Factory function to create a selector to extract the JSON encoded body of a request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createJsonBodySelector(options?: JsonBodySelectorOptions): AsyncSelector<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>JsonBodySelectorOptions</code> | Options such as limit and encoding |

<b>Returns:</b>

`AsyncSelector<any>`

A selector for JSON body requests

## Example

Simple example

```ts

const jsonBodySelector = createJsonBodySelector({
 limit: "1mb"
})

const prismyHandler = prismy(
 [jsonBodySelector],
 body => {
   ...
 }
)


```
